title: Order To Cash (Associate, Sr Associate & Process Lead)
tagsAndSkills: SAP,Order To Cash,Procure To Pay,Cash Applications,Application,Order fulfillment,Pay,Process
jobDescription:
Location: Reliable IT Park, Airoli.


Shift: 6am to 3pm(Home pickup facility available) or 11:30 am to 8:30 pm (home drop facility available)

The candidate should be able to understand the End to End Order to Cash Cash Application cycle and should be able to allocate/apply cash against invoices with valid remittances.


Principal Accountabilities

  • Should have OTC (Cash Application) Knowledge
  • Cash Application & Allocation knowledge in SAP.
  • Should be able to investigate; send follow-up with credit controllers, customers for Unallocated/Unidentified Cash
  • To meet set targets on productivity and accuracy consistently.
  • Contributing in the process improvement initiatives.
  • Timeliness of delivery Accuracy of output

Skills & Knowledge

  • 1-4 years of experience in OTC with SAP (Added Advantage)
  • Should have Cash Application Experience.
  • Analytical skills & Communication skills.
  • Educational Qualification Graduate/Post Graduate (with relevant experience)/MBA Preferred.

Interested Candidates Send Your Updated CV at - atul.ubale.ext@holcim.com

title: Account Manager- Integrated Digital Solutions
tagsAndSkills: digital marketing,digital,project management,digital strategy,client servicing,media,advertising,account management
jobDescription:
Strategic responsibilities

  • Monitor the implementation of strategies and ensure alignment with client business objectives for seamless cross-BU integration in integrated digital marketing projects, fostering a cohesive approach to project delivery
  • Enhance project profitability by ensuring adherence to delivery timelines, high quality project delivery as per agreed SOW.
  • Highlight and bring to notice cases of scope creep, non-adherence to processes to ensure project profitability
  • Ensure delivery alignment with project objectives to meet client expectations
  • Implement key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide regular reports on project status, resource utilization, and financial performance
  • Stay informed on industry trends, emerging technologies, and innovative project management methodologies and digital marketing trends to maintain a competitive edge

MANAGERIAL RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Establish and maintain effective communication channels with program managers, project leads, BU heads, integrated media planner, and the resource management team.
  • Attend training and development to ensure positioning of the IDS team as the holistic digital marketing expert across the verticals.
  • Manage budgets for integrated projects, ensuring financial objectives are met
  • Indicate areas of better allocation of resources based on project requirements to ensure optimal utilization to deliver as per the targeted project profitability.
  • Identify potential risks in integrated projects, develop mitigation strategies, and establish contingency plans, escalate issues in a timely manner to avoid client attrition.
  • Implement and maintain quality assurance processes to ensure deliverables meet high standards and client expectations.
  • Escalate cases of potential conflicts within the integrated project teams or with stakeholders, to ensure project continuity.
  • Highlight contract expiry deadlines to ensure timely renewals.

FUnCTIONAL RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Oversee the planning, execution, and closure of integrated projects as per agreed timelines and milestones.
  • Work closely with client SPOC and keep him/her informed about the project status.
  • Facilitate and ensure collaboration and communication between different BUs, promoting a cohesive approach to integrated project delivery

 

  • Ensure meeting of governance guidelines and appropriate organization level connects to foster strategic alignment and strong client partnership.
  • Ensure adherence to financial guidelines of the organization.
  • Intervene and escalate non adherence of established processes within different BUs,

title: Lead Teacher - Navi Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: Teaching,Leadership
jobDescription:
Overview

The quality of school education available to students from low-income communities across India is abysmal. Their chances of getting admitted to a college or building a career are much lower than their high-income peers, condemning them to a life without voice or choice. iTeach was born to declare war on this status quo and create a level playing field for ALL children. We do this in Pune and Navi Mumbai by co-creating contextual school models with Municipal Corporations.


We run 10 free and high-impact secondary schools and a college-to-career program for the most disadvantaged students. In 2024, with a staff of 250 members across 10 schools, we will serve 3000 students and 2000 alumni - giving students a fighting chance at college, career, and citizenship. We aim to grow to 30 schools and 10,000 students over the next five years. 


Role Summary

The Lead Teacher role has three key responsibilities areas - teaching, coaching teachers, and project management (see this in a 3 min video here). These responsibilities cumulatively imply co-leading the school with your Principal, which makes the Lead Teacher role an ideal stepping stone to School Leadership! We are looking for committed educators who want to continue building excellence in their classrooms and parallelly start their journey as teacher-coaches with four to five teachers.


Responsibilities

l. Teaching one subject to one grade (25% focus)

  • Set the vision of excellence for pedagogy in your school and the entire network by teaching one grade and one subject at sheer inspiring excellence.
  • Develop and execute exemplary unit plans, which employ advanced pedagogical approaches.
  • Innovate lesson designs, execution strategies, and data analysis approaches toward inspiring and informing the broader ecosystem of schools.

 ll. Coaching & Managing a team of teachers (50% focus)

  • Lead a group of four to five teachers (performance management, coaching, career guidance).
  • Set ambitious goals with your teachers, create individual growth plans and coach them toward life-changing outcomes for students (iTeach employs a hands-on coaching model with about two hours per teacher per week of coaching)
  • Co-create the overall school culture and strategy with your School Principal

lll. Project Management (25% focus)

  • Design and execute various projects for the schools program (these could be for holistic development of students, initiatives for parent and community involvement, or for innovation in school practices).
  • Measure outcomes and work on refining the design and implementation year on year.
  • Document the project plans to enable other schools to replicate them.

Education & Experience:

  • Exceptional performance as a teacher for 2-3 years
  • Overall work experience of 3+ years
  • A strong contributor to the school outside the classroom as well
  • Ability to lead a part of a larger team and deliver strong results
  • Preferred: Experience in coaching and development of teachers

Compensation and Benefits: We take pride in offering competitive compensation and benefits commensurate with the candidate's education and work experience. The salary range for this position ranges from 6.5 - 7.5 LPA CTC, and we are dedicated to providing top-notch industry benefits. These benefits include PF, gratuity, medical insurance (up to 3 lakh PA), paid leaves, annual increments, and promotion opportunities.

title: Pest Control Technician
tagsAndSkills: Chemical,Pest control,Pest,Control
jobDescription:
Tahaan Pest Solutions LLP is looking for Pest Control Technician to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Conducting electrocardiogram (EKG), phonocardiogram, echocardiogram, and stress tests by using electronic equipment.
  2. Ensuring cardiology patients are comfortable by answering any questions they have about the tests.
  3. Recording the results of cardiological tests and consulting with the physician on duty to schedule any follow-up tests.
  4. Assisting physicians during non-evasive cardiological procedures by monitoring the patients' heart rates and alerting the physicians to any readings outside normal ranges.
  5. Maintaining cardiological equipment and supplies with daily cleanings and adjustments.
  6. Recording supply inventory levels and restocking the supply storeroom accordingly.
  7. Troubleshooting problems with cardiological equipment and reporting any malfunctions to superiors.
  8. Staying up-to-date with cardiological developments by attending conferences and participating in research projects
